name: Out of the Pit
description:
Out of the Pit is a game about collecting resources in order to escape.

There are three two (one of them is broken) endings. If you get stuck watch the gameplay video.

Made for Kindred Community Jam #6.

This is my second game jam, since I started doing some game dev this year.

The web build is kinda broken, so I recommend downloading the game.

The audio is stuttery (for me atleast) and there is lots of random lag.

I also realised that the secret ending doesn't work in the build. If you flew too high you would get a quote about Icarus, but instead you just get a black screen.

Also the Linux version apparently has no audio.

Sorry about all the problems, I hope you still enjoy.

Controls:

Inventory: E / I

Move: WASD / arrow keys (/space to jump)

Mine / Place / Use: LMB
